src_text: Pa Mande, Sara Danius, mlembi wakukhazikika wa Komiti iyo yikupeleka njombe ya Nobel kwa awo ŵachita makora pa nkhani ya kulemba mabuku pa Swedish Academy, wakapharazga pakweru mu pulogiramu ya pa wayilesi ya Sveriges ku Sweden kuti komiti iyi, yikatondeka kuyowoyeskana na Bob Dylan mwakudunjika kuti yimuphalire kuti wawina nkhombo ya Nobel mu 2016 pa chigaŵa cha kulemba mabuku, ndipo yaleka waka kumupenja kuti yidumbiskane nayo.
ref_text: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.
hyp_text: In 2016, Sara Danius, the permanent secretary of the Academy, was tasked by the Swedish Academy to lead the Nobel Committee in awarding the Nobel Prize in Literature, and after a long process, they chose Bob Dylan, who was surprised and declined the award, and the Academy had to wait for his response.

src_text: Apo wakagwiranga ntchito mu NSA, wakawovwira Carter pa nkhani ya umo wangadumbiskirana mwatende na vyaru pa nkhani zakupambanapambana, nga ni Mapangano agho ghakachitikira pa Camp David, mu 1978; kulutiska panthazi mtende pakati pa charu cha US na China chakuumaliro wa vyaka vya m'ma 1970; pa nkhani ya kuchichizga boma kuti vinthu visinthe uko ŵanthu ŵakachita mu charu cha Iran, uko kukapangiska ŵanthu ŵanandi kujalirika mu jele mu 1979; ndiposo pa nkhani ya kunjira na kuwukira charu cha Afghanistan uko boma la Soviet likachita mu 1979.
ref_text: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.
hyp_text: After leaving office, Carter was involved in the Camp David Accords in 1978, a peace treaty between the US and Egypt, which resolved the conflict in the Middle East; he also played a key role in the 1970s in trying to prevent a war between Iran and Iraq, which eventually broke out in 1979; and he was a key figure in the US response to the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan in 1979.

[Tumbuka]: Kweni, ŵose awo ŵakuyowoya Cifaransa ku Belgium na ku Switzerland ŵakuŵa kuti ŵasambira Cifaransa cakuyowoyeka ku France ku sukulu, ipo ŵangapulika makola waka nanga ungagwiriska nchito manambala gha mu Cifaransa ca ku France.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Tumbuka]: Kwa vyaka vinandi, ŵanthu ŵali kuzenga masitepe pa cikhizga mpaka pacanya pa mapiri agho ghakubeka kunyanja.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Tumbuka]: Payipi ya Trans-Alaska Pipeline System yikajalika pa mtunda wa mamayilozi 800 chifukwa cha kusulura kwa malita ghanandi gha mafuta kumwera kwa Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Tumbuka]: Vigaŵa va Belgum ivi viliko sono wikaŵa lwande lwa Luxembourg kale kweni vikazgoka vya charu cha Belgium pamanyuma pa mukangano wa mu ma 1830 uwo ukapangiska kuti Belgium chiŵe charu cha kuyima pa chekha.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Tumbuka]: Kufuma apo kampani ya Onion yikambira, yaluta panthazi chomene pa nkhani ya kuthandazga makani, ndipo nyuzipepala yake ndiposo nkhani za pa webusayiti yake, vikaŵazgika na ŵanthu ŵakukwana 5,000,000 mu mwezi wa Okutobala, kusaska malonda gha ŵanthu, kupharazga makani pa Kanema usiku na muhanya, kuŵika mavidiyo gha nkhani pa intaneti, ndipo sonosono apa yafumiska buku lakuchemeka Our Dumb World ilo likulongosora vyaru vyose vya pa charu chapasi .
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

src_text: Ŵakusanda ŵakufuma pa Yunivesite ya Princeton ku United States na pa Yunivesite ya Uppsala ku Sweden ŵakayowoya kuti mitundu yiphya iyi yikasintha mu miwiro yiŵiri pera, nangauli kumanyuma ŵakagomezganga kuti kusintha uku kukotora nyengo yitali kuti kuchitike, chifukwa cha kubabirana kwa pakati viyuni vya tchete (endemic Darwin finch), Sitche (Geospiza fortes), na viyuni ivyo vili kuchita kwiza vya mtundu wa mpheta (cactus finch), Nkhuzumweru (Geospiza conirostris).
ref_text: Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.
hyp_text: They studied at Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden, focusing on evolutionary biology, and later became experts in the study of the Galapagos finches, including the endemic Darwin's finch, the Sitche (Geospiza fortes), and the cactus finch, the Nkhuzumweru (Geospiza conirostris).

[Tumbuka]: Kweni, ŵose awo ŵakuyowoya Cifaransa ku Belgium na ku Switzerland ŵakuŵa kuti ŵasambira Cifaransa cakuyowoyeka ku France ku sukulu, ipo ŵangapulika makola waka nanga ungagwiriska nchito manambala gha mu Cifaransa ca ku France.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Tumbuka]: Kwa vyaka vinandi, ŵanthu ŵali kuzenga masitepe pa cikhizga mpaka pacanya pa mapiri agho ghakubeka kunyanja.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Tumbuka]: Payipi ya Trans-Alaska Pipeline System yikajalika pa mtunda wa mamayilozi 800 chifukwa cha kusulura kwa malita ghanandi gha mafuta kumwera kwa Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Tumbuka]: Vigaŵa va Belgum ivi viliko sono wikaŵa lwande lwa Luxembourg kale kweni vikazgoka vya charu cha Belgium pamanyuma pa mukangano wa mu ma 1830 uwo ukapangiska kuti Belgium chiŵe charu cha kuyima pa chekha.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Tumbuka]: Kufuma apo kampani ya Onion yikambira, yaluta panthazi chomene pa nkhani ya kuthandazga makani, ndipo nyuzipepala yake ndiposo nkhani za pa webusayiti yake, vikaŵazgika na ŵanthu ŵakukwana 5,000,000 mu mwezi wa Okutobala, kusaska malonda gha ŵanthu, kupharazga makani pa Kanema usiku na muhanya, kuŵika mavidiyo gha nkhani pa intaneti, ndipo sonosono apa yafumiska buku lakuchemeka Our Dumb World ilo likulongosora vyaru vyose vya pa charu chapasi .
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

src_text: Kulanguruka kwa ku Tibet kuli kutoleka chomene ku Yoga wa chiuta (Deity Yoga). Apo munthu wakujitora nga wakuwona ŵachiuta ŵakupambanapambana vyakupeleka nkhongono vikujulika, nkhongono zauzimu zikwiza mu thupi ndipo wakupulikiska kuti wangweruskika.
ref_text: The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.
hyp_text: In Tibet, it is believed that through the practice of Deity Yoga, a person can see the deity's manifestation and, in a state of intense devotion, can actually merge with it, dissolving the boundaries between the physical and spiritual worlds and achieving a state of unity with the divine.

[Tumbuka]: Kweni, ŵose awo ŵakuyowoya Cifaransa ku Belgium na ku Switzerland ŵakuŵa kuti ŵasambira Cifaransa cakuyowoyeka ku France ku sukulu, ipo ŵangapulika makola waka nanga ungagwiriska nchito manambala gha mu Cifaransa ca ku France.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Tumbuka]: Kwa vyaka vinandi, ŵanthu ŵali kuzenga masitepe pa cikhizga mpaka pacanya pa mapiri agho ghakubeka kunyanja.

[Tumbuka]: Payipi ya Trans-Alaska Pipeline System yikajalika pa mtunda wa mamayilozi 800 chifukwa cha kusulura kwa malita ghanandi gha mafuta kumwera kwa Fairbanks, Alaska.

[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

hyp_text: The travel agent also offers packages to various countries, including round-trip flights, and then books the hotel and arranges for a taxi to pick you up from the airport, or you can book the flight and hotel separately.
prompt:
<|begin_of_text|><|start_header_id|>system<|end_header_id|>

You are an accurate translator. You MUST answer with the following JSON scheme: {"translation": string}<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>user<|end_header_id|>

[Tumbuka]: Kweni, ŵose awo ŵakuyowoya Cifaransa ku Belgium na ku Switzerland ŵakuŵa kuti ŵasambira Cifaransa cakuyowoyeka ku France ku sukulu, ipo ŵangapulika makola waka nanga ungagwiriska nchito manambala gha mu Cifaransa ca ku France.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Tumbuka]: Kwa vyaka vinandi, ŵanthu ŵali kuzenga masitepe pa cikhizga mpaka pacanya pa mapiri agho ghakubeka kunyanja.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Tumbuka]: Payipi ya Trans-Alaska Pipeline System yikajalika pa mtunda wa mamayilozi 800 chifukwa cha kusulura kwa malita ghanandi gha mafuta kumwera kwa Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Tumbuka]: Vigaŵa va Belgum ivi viliko sono wikaŵa lwande lwa Luxembourg kale kweni vikazgoka vya charu cha Belgium pamanyuma pa mukangano wa mu ma 1830 uwo ukapangiska kuti Belgium chiŵe charu cha kuyima pa chekha.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Tumbuka]: Kufuma apo kampani ya Onion yikambira, yaluta panthazi chomene pa nkhani ya kuthandazga makani, ndipo nyuzipepala yake ndiposo nkhani za pa webusayiti yake, vikaŵazgika na ŵanthu ŵakukwana 5,000,000 mu mwezi wa Okutobala, kusaska malonda gha ŵanthu, kupharazga makani pa Kanema usiku na muhanya, kuŵika mavidiyo gha nkhani pa intaneti, ndipo sonosono apa yafumiska buku lakuchemeka Our Dumb World ilo likulongosora vyaru vyose vya pa charu chapasi .
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

hyp_text: The Finns, however, are a different story; they were initially hesitant to join the EU, and it was only after Finland and Sweden, along with Austria, Denmark, and Portugal, were invited that they decided to join.

[Tumbuka]: Kweni, ŵose awo ŵakuyowoya Cifaransa ku Belgium na ku Switzerland ŵakuŵa kuti ŵasambira Cifaransa cakuyowoyeka ku France ku sukulu, ipo ŵangapulika makola waka nanga ungagwiriska nchito manambala gha mu Cifaransa ca ku France.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Tumbuka]: Kwa vyaka vinandi, ŵanthu ŵali kuzenga masitepe pa cikhizga mpaka pacanya pa mapiri agho ghakubeka kunyanja.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Tumbuka]: Payipi ya Trans-Alaska Pipeline System yikajalika pa mtunda wa mamayilozi 800 chifukwa cha kusulura kwa malita ghanandi gha mafuta kumwera kwa Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Tumbuka]: Vigaŵa va Belgum ivi viliko sono wikaŵa lwande lwa Luxembourg kale kweni vikazgoka vya charu cha Belgium pamanyuma pa mukangano wa mu ma 1830 uwo ukapangiska kuti Belgium chiŵe charu cha kuyima pa chekha.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Tumbuka]: Kufuma apo kampani ya Onion yikambira, yaluta panthazi chomene pa nkhani ya kuthandazga makani, ndipo nyuzipepala yake ndiposo nkhani za pa webusayiti yake, vikaŵazgika na ŵanthu ŵakukwana 5,000,000 mu mwezi wa Okutobala, kusaska malonda gha ŵanthu, kupharazga makani pa Kanema usiku na muhanya, kuŵika mavidiyo gha nkhani pa intaneti, ndipo sonosono apa yafumiska buku lakuchemeka Our Dumb World ilo likulongosora vyaru vyose vya pa charu chapasi .
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Tumbuka]: Payipi ya Trans-Alaska Pipeline System yikajalika pa mtunda wa mamayilozi 800 chifukwa cha kusulura kwa malita ghanandi gha mafuta kumwera kwa Fairbanks, Alaska.
